description:
Eleent Value Chain is a decentralized advertising resource aggregation ecosystem

Through its unique "neural network" and detailed classification of inventory under smart contracts, and integration of idle inventory. The advertiser and the advertiser can exchange the fragmented advertisement information freely, and exchange and enhance the value between the different fields through ELeENT VALUE CHAIN. Through the circulation and encouragement of the EVC ecosystem, the ecosystem can operate efficiently and automatically, and realize the autonomous management within the ecology, and improve the conversion rate coverage and profitability of advertising resources.
name: Eleent Value Chain
